programme.desc: John Hinkley Jr. shoots President Ronald Reagan, reportedly to gain the attention of a young Hollywood star; a lab worker derails the criminal justice system, resulting in freedom for convicted criminals.

programme.title: Scripps News Reports
programme.sub-title: Harvest Interrupted: The Cost Of Enforcement
programme.desc: The impact of immigration raids and legal enforcement on farms and farming communities across America as a shortage of workers leads to crops rotting in the ground and concerns of rising prices.

programme.title: Scripps News Reports
programme.desc: How trade tensions and tariffs are impacting vital imports through our ports, the prices we pay, jobs and employment, and even the toy industry.

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall
programme.desc: What begins as another sun-soaked day in Boca Raton, Fla., ends in blood-soaked violence, leaving a mother of three a quadriplegic; police find that this seemingly random act may not have been so random after all.
